report.name: ree_syntheseGlobale

dataSource.name: Q_SYNTH_GLOBALE

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( sum ( REESTIME ) , 0 , 0 , ROUND ( ( ( sum ( REALISE ) ) / ( sum ( REESTIME ) ) ) * 100 , 1 ) )
decode ( sum ( REESTIME ) , 0 , 0 , ROUND ( ( ( ( sum ( RAF_BIP ) - sum ( RAF_RESSOURCE ) ) ) / ( sum ( REESTIME ) ) ) * 100 , 1 ) )

cf_real_reestime_depformula
cf_ecart_estime_depformula
cf_real_reestimeformula
cf_ecart_estimeformula
r_total1formattrigger
afterpform
